name: The Pudding Team
bio: is a group of folks telling stories with visual essays.

name: Matt Daniels
bio: is a journalist-engineer at The Pudding. He first experienced Internet fame in 2014 and has been chasing that feeling ever since.

name: Russell Samora
bio: is a journalist-engineer at The Pudding. Scorpio. Svelte enthusiast. Crokinole evangelist.

name: Ilia Blinderman
bio: is a journalist-engineer at The Pudding. He was first an academic, then a writer, and finally, joined those two occupations in holy union through data-driven storytelling.

name: Jan Diehm
bio: is a journalist-engineer at The Pudding. She appreciates the finer things in life: LEGO, southern delicacies like pimento cheese and fried green tomatoes, and Britney Spears.

name: Caitlyn Ralph
bio: is the Studio Director at Polygraph. She likes film photography, running, Animal Crossing, a band called Inhaler, and a K-pop group called Stray Kids. Mostly Stray Kids. Mostly Jeongin. ü¶äü•üüê∂

name: Kevin Litman-Navarro
bio: is a journalist-engineer at The Pudding. He rarely ventures out of his neighborhood, where he has a piano, climbing gym, and a veritable bevy of bars/cafes/restaurants in close proximity.

name: Michelle McGhee
bio: is a journalist-engineer at The Pudding. She finds joy in drinking boba, singing harmonies, and automating things that could probably be done manually.

name: Jane Collier
bio: is a former audience engagement manager at The Pudding. She advocated for community mental health before discovering her passion for design. She loves art-activism, queer films, and late night conversations.

name: Amber Thomas
bio: is a former journalist-engineer at The Pudding. She is a data-lover, story-teller, and pro question asker. She spends time away from her keyboard exploring the outdoors around Seattle and hanging upside down in aerial silks.

name: Amelia Wattenberger
bio: is a former journalist-engineer at The Pudding. She is a developer, designer, and data translator. She loves creating things in any medium, be it laser cutting, cooking, or coding. She made her dog a treadmill once, two days before he tore his ACL.

name: Rob Smith
bio: is the former Managing Director at The Pudding. A librarian, art historian and reformed publicist, when he‚Äôs not working at¬†The Pudding, you‚Äôll find him making his own puddings‚Äîand pastries and cookies and cakes‚Äîat home in Brooklyn.

name: Isabel Carter
bio: is a former intern at The Pudding (summer of 2019).

name: Swati Murugappan
bio: is a former intern at The Pudding (summer of 2019).

name: Charlie Smart
bio: is a journalist, designer, and web tinkerer. He likes good food and good music.

name: Malaika Handa
bio: is occasionally a data scientist and occasionally a software engineer. She likes ggplot, higher order functions, and rewatching The Great British Bake Off.

name: Alexandra Saizan
bio: is a data analyst living in Washington, D.C. She enjoys cats, comics and long reads on the beach.

name: Sacha Maxim
bio: is a Seattle-based designer, musician, and proud pom-mom.

name: Alec Barrett
bio: is a senior web developer at Datadog. He‚Äôs interested in dataviz, politics, and education.

name: Sara Stoudt
bio: is a statistician and aspiring data journalist. When she isn‚Äôt data wrangling, she loves reading, brunching, and crafting the perfect playlist.

name: Isabella Chua
bio: is a writer at Kontinentalist. She‚Äôs particularly interested in social issues - religion, crime, identity, and food. Isabella loves to dig beyond what is ‚Äòcommonsensical‚Äô or ‚Äònatural‚Äô to us, by looking at the larger forces (or even accidents), that may have structured these beliefs. While she strives to stay curious about the world by listening to podcasts and taking classes, she‚Äôs happiest when eating pastries, cakes, and drinking tea.

name: Erin Davis
bio: makes stuff with data. She also likes cats, gardening, and reading lots of books.

name: Liana Sposto
bio: is a freelance illustrator living on a sailboat with her husband in sunny Southern California. Today she saw a sea turtle!

name: Alice Feng
bio: visualizes data with a focus on public policy issues. When not thinking about how to use data viz to make the world a better place, she enjoys reading, climbing, doing photography, and just generally being lost in her own thoughts.

name: Elizabeth de Luna
bio: is a subject matter expert in K-pop, YouTube, fandom, internet culture and influencers. She writes for Teen Vogue and MTV News and advises brands and artists on connecting with Millennial and Gen Z audiences.

name: Sam Learner
bio: is a developer and analyst now living in Pittsburgh. He‚Äôs interested in visualizing public data to make it more accessible

name: RJ Andrews
bio: is author and founder of Info We Trust. RJ‚Äôs talent is helping organizations solve information problems. His passion is studying the history of information graphics to discover design insights.

name: Mike Lacher
bio: is a freelance copywriter and creative director who does a whole bunch of stuff: funny stuff, serious stuff, videos, stunts, branding, strategy, games, bots, and more.

name: Kat Wilson
bio: is a quantitative methodologist. In addition to writing about other people‚Äôs music, she also makes her own.

name: Pamela Mishkin
bio: currently works on making algorithms less sinister. She also talks a lot about voting systems, Finnish architecture, and JoJo Siwa under various anagram-based aliases.

name: Lars Verspohl
bio: is a visualisation designer and developer who likes to surface the wonders of the data oceans. His other passion is Snakes and Ladders, which he keeps playing although he hasn‚Äôt won a game in years.

name: Ofunne Amaka
bio: is the founder of Cocoa Swatches and The Baseics. When she is not filming makeup tutorials or exploring the intersections of beauty, race, and tech, she can be found making oat milk lattes, styling her latest online purchases, and/or listening to a new audiobook.

name: Jeff MacInnes
bio: is a data scientist, visualization designer, and visual storyteller. He pokes around woodsy parts of the Northwest, puts hot sauce on everything, and will talk to you about saunas (perhaps more than you want).

name: Gabrielle Hickmon
bio: is a model for Black girls who live on the road. She is usually watching the same 5 TV shows over and over again and thinks Soundcloud has the best algorithm out there for suggesting new music.

name: Jennifer Ding
bio: is a Data Scientist working on public interest tech at companies like Thresher, Numina, and ParkIT, which she co-founded. She enjoys massaging data big and small, trying new ways to make coffee, and discovering new public puppy cams.

name: Leonardo Nicoletti
bio: is a photographer turned data-viz nerd made in Paris, Rome, and Vancouver, BC. In his code-free time, Leonardo likes to connect with his Mediterranean roots in the kitchen, sleep in a tent, and collect bicycles.

name: Sahiti Sarva
bio: is a story-seeker, saree lover and engineer who entered the world of public policy. She's usually found chit-chatting and spends the rest of her time writing, coding and playing storytelling games.

name: Jamie Brew
bio: is a writer and computer programmer. He is the CEO of Botnik, one of the "Big Four" A.I. comedy writing companies.

name: Rebecca Monteleone
bio: is an assistant professor of disability studies at the University of Toledo. She writes and teaches about disabled expertise in tech, healthcare, journalism, and more.

name: Alejandra Arevalo
bio: is a multimedia journalist who writes about everything and anything, from racism within the Latino community to the hottest beauty brands in the market. Hailing from the home country of potatoes, Peru, she‚Äôs on a quest to find the best fries wherever she goes (send her your recommendations).

name: Eric Hausken
bio: is a Data Analyst who enjoys creating data visualizations about sports, education, geography and almost anything else. When he‚Äôs not developing and learning about data vizzes, Eric can be found playing and refereeing soccer games. You can follow him on the socials

name: Luc Guillemot
bio: is a data journalist. If he's not working with data and code, he's probably running in a forest or dancing to techno music at home in Berlin.

name: Elio Quinton
bio: is nourished by music, audio and science. He is Sr. Director of Machine Learning and Audio R&D at Universal Music during the day and can otherwise be found on a tennis court or behind a drum kit.

name: Aaron Reiss
bio: is a freelance visual journalist and mapmaker whose work explores how people imagine and shape the places they inhabit. When he is not researching urban life and landscapes, he is teaching ceramics or visual storytelling classes in NYC.

name: Manyun Zou
bio: is a graduate student majoring in computational social science at Northeastern University. She was previously a data reporter in China, covering topics like business, gender, and government policies. She is also a cat and coffee addict.

name: Oscar Molina Palestina
bio: is a PhD of Art History, teacher and researcher at the National Autonomous University of Mexico. His research centers around the study of the transformations of Mexico City from an urban and social perspective and on iconography in art. He is also a photojournalist.

name: Aaron Williams
bio: is a data journalist, analyst and visualization expert tackling inequity in data and design. He's a staff visualization engineer in Netflix's Data Science and Engineering group and spent a decade as a data and graphics reporter‚Äîmost recently at the Washington Post. He serves on the advisory board for OpenNews and is a News Product Alliance board member.

name: Abby VanMuijen
bio: (they/them) is a drawer of complicated and also not so complicated things. They can often be found appreciating leaves and rocks or taking a nap somewhere unexpected.

name: Caroline Sinders
bio: is an award winning critical designer, researcher, and artist. She‚Äôs the founder of human rights and design lab, Convocation Research + Design. She‚Äôs worked with the Tate Exchange at the Tate Modern, the United Nations, Ars Electronica‚Äôs AI Lab, the Harvard Kennedy School and others.

name: Tynesha Foreman
bio: is a passionate animator with a proclivity for the strange and wonderful. They incorporate these passions through animation, character design and Illustration. They‚Äôve been animating for various publications, ad agencies, TV / web series all up and down the east coast with a focus on story telling, social justice, Black Identity, and general bad-assery.

name: Jada Watson
bio: is an Assistant Professor of Digital Humanities in the School of Information Studies at the University of Ottawa and the Principal Investigator for SongData.

name: Chris Dalla Riva
bio: is a musician and data journalist whose work has been featured by NPR, The Economist, and Business Insider. His weekly newsletter Can't Get Much Higher chronicles the intersection of music and data.

name: Ashley Cai
bio: is a designer, developer, journalist, and student at Brown|RISD. She previously worked for the LA Times.

name: Alice Liang
bio: is a writer & data analyst based in Brooklyn. She can typically be found writing poems, making crossword puzzles, or embroidering while watching reality TV.
